name: encoded
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
encode
[ T often passive ] to change something into a system for sending messages secretly, or to represent complicated information in a simple or short way: Many satellite broadcasts are encoded so that they can only be received by people who have paid to see them. Some music CDs are encoded with information about the performers and their music.
[ I or T ]
  language
  specialized to use a word or phrase in a foreign language in the correct way: Grammatical information helps learners to encode sentences. Compare
decode
